title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building smarter AI coding assistants: real-world implementation guide (SPS322)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建更智能的AI编码助手：实际实施指南 (SPS322)
abstract: Your AI coding assistant generates impressive code at lightning speed, but production deployments reveal the harsh reality - perfect authentication that ignores existing workflows, elegant APIs that break integration patterns. Join the Agentic AI ProServe Experience team to explore solutions to this "blindfolded coding agent" challenge. Through live coding with Amazon Q and Kiro, learn how to organize knowledge for maximum effectiveness: foundational principles, systematic workflows, automated quality gates, and real-time data access. Watch us build these knowledge artifacts live, incorporating lessons from real customer scenarios.
abstract_cn: 您的AI编码助手能以闪电般的速度生成令人印象深刻的代码,但生产部署却揭示了残酷的现实——完美的身份验证却忽略了现有工作流程,优雅的API却破坏了集成模式。加入Agentic AI ProServe Experience团队,探索这一"蒙眼编码代理"挑战的解决方案。通过使用Amazon Q和Kiro进行实时编码,学习如何组织知识以实现最大效能:基础原则、系统化工作流程、自动化质量门禁和实时数据访问。观看我们实时构建这些知识工件,融入来自真实客户场景的经验教训。
